positive_examples: This is an example of artillery barrage.
The artillery barrage demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed artillery barrage in this context.
A typical case of artillery barrage would involve these features.
The concept of artillery barrage applies here.
A military assault involving concentrated and sustained fire from heavy guns or cannons.
negative_examples: This is an example of direct assault, not artillery barrage.
This represents military assault in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DirectAssault, or other types of MilitaryAssault

definition: Intensive bombardment of an area using artillery weapons.
